comment: A variant of ~ al2imi : instead of applying ` A. x ` quantifiers to the final implication, replace them with ` E. x ` . A shorter proof is possible using ~ nfa1 , ~ sps and ~ eximd , but it depends on more axioms. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 18-Aug-2019.)
